# layoutMarginsGuide

**Instance Property**

A layout guide representing the view’s margins.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var layoutMarginsGuide: UILayoutGuide { get }
```

## Discussion

Use this layout guide’s anchors to create constraints with the view’s margin.

## Related Documentation

- **layoutMargins**: The default spacing to use when laying out content in the view.

## Working with layout guides

- **addLayoutGuide(_:)**: Adds the specified layout guide to the view.
- **layoutGuides**: The array of layout guide objects owned by this view.
- **readableContentGuide**: A layout guide representing an area with a readable width within the view.
- **removeLayoutGuide(_:)**: Removes the specified layout guide from the view.
